comments.name: Suzanne Chang
comments.text: Awesome idea! Trying to find framework-specific projects within the hubs can be tedious

comments.name: Thomas Hood
comments.text: Please use fun, color-coded labels to easily identify them at a glance

feedbacks.title: Add tags for solution
feedbacks.content: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

feedbacks.title: Add a dark theme option
feedbacks.content: It would help people with light sensitivities and who prefer dark mode.

feedbacks.title: Q&A within the challenge hubs
feedbacks.content: Challenge-specific Q&A would make for easy reference.

feedbacks.title: Add image/video upload to feedback
feedbacks.content: Images and screencasts can enhance comments on solutions.

feedbacks.title: Preview images not loading
feedbacks.content: Challenge preview images are missing when you apply a filter
